Immersive starter hoard 10 metal coins : 2 of each metal (copper, silver, electrum, gold, platinum). Choose one multiplier for the whole set. Contents: 2 copper coins 2 silver coins 2 electrum coins 2 gold coins 2 platinum coins Single multiplier choice: ×1, ×10, ×100, ×1000, ×10000 Finish: unit (shiny) or engraved (slightly matte) Use multipliers to speed up counting without breaking immersion.
